verses.text: PEA pehē ‘e Sāmiuela kia Saula, Na‘e fekau au ‘e Sihova ke pani koe ke tu‘i ki hono kakai, ‘a ‘Isileli, pea ko eni, fanongo mai ki he le‘o ‘o e folofola ‘a Sihova.
Ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova Sāpaoti, Kuo u fakamanatu ‘a e me‘a na‘e fai ‘e ‘Amaleki ki ‘Isileli, ‘a ‘ene tu‘u ki ai ‘i he hala, ‘i he‘ene ‘alu hake mei ‘Isipite.

Ko ia, ke ke ‘alu ‘o taa‘i ‘a ‘Amaleki, pea ke mōifua ‘a e me‘a kotoa ‘oku ne ma‘u, ‘o ‘oua te ke mamae ki ai; ka ke tāmate‘i ‘a e tangata mo e fefine, ‘a e tamaiki mo e fefine, ‘a e tamaiki mo e kei huhu, ‘a e pulu mo e sipi, ‘a e kāmeli mo e ‘asi.
Pea fanongonongo ‘e Saula ke ha‘u ‘a e kakai, ‘o ne lau kinautolu ‘i Telaimi, ko e toko ua kilu ‘a e tau hā‘ele, pea taha mano ‘a e kau Siuta.
Pea a‘u ‘a Saula ki he kolo ‘Amaleki, ‘o ne fakatoka ha malumu ‘i he talalo.

Pea me‘a ‘a Saula ki ha‘a Keini, Mou ‘alu, hiki, ‘alu hifo mei he lotolotonga ‘o ha‘a ‘Amaleki, na‘a ku faka‘osi koe fakataha mo ia: ka na‘a ke fai ‘ofa ki ha‘a ‘Isileli kotoa ‘i he‘enau ‘alu hake mei ‘Isipite. Ko ia na‘e hiki ‘e ha‘a Keini mei he lotolotonga ‘o ha‘a ‘Amaleki.
Pea taa‘i ‘e Saula ‘a ‘Amaleki, mei Havila ‘o fakapehē ki Sua, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he matāfonua ‘o ‘Isipite.
Pea ne puke mo‘ui ‘a ‘Ēkaki ko e Tu‘i ‘Amaleki, ka ko hono kotoa ‘o e kakai na‘a ne mōifua ‘aki ‘a e mata ‘o e heletā.

Ka na‘e ma‘ema‘ekina ‘e Saula mo e kakai ‘a ‘Ēkaki, pea mo e lelei ‘o e sipi mo e pulu, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e ‘oloua, mo e fanga lami, ‘io, ‘a ia kotoa pē na‘e lelei, ‘o ‘ikai te nau tāmate‘i mōifua kinautolu: ka ko e kotoa kotoa na‘e feifei‘avale mo tutue, na‘a nau mōifua ia.
Pea hoko mai ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki kia Sāmiuela, ‘o pehē,

‘Oku ou fakatomala ‘i he‘eku fokotu‘u ‘a Saula ke tu‘i: he kuo ne tuku ‘ene muimui kiate au, pea kuo ‘ikai te ne fakaai ‘eku ngaahi lea. Pea na‘e ‘ita ‘a Sāmiuela; pea ne tangi kia Sihova ‘i he pō ko ia ‘o ‘aho.

Pea tu‘u hengihengi hake ‘a Sāmiuela ke fakafetaulaki kia Saula; pea na‘e fakapā kia Sāmiuela, ‘o pehē, Na‘e ha‘u ‘a Saula ki Kāmeli, pea tā kuo ne fokotu‘u hano fakamanatu, pea kuo ne tafoki ‘o laka ange, ‘o ‘alu hifo ki Kilikali.
Pea a‘u ‘a Sāmiuela kia Saula: pea me‘a ki ai ‘a Saula, ke monū‘ia koe meia Sihova: kuo u fakaai ‘a e folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Sāmiuela, Pea ko e hā ai ‘a e lea ‘a e fanga sipi ‘oku ongoonga‘a mai, mo e tangi ‘a e fanga pulu ‘oku ou fanongoa?
Pea tali ‘e Saula, Kuo nau ‘omi mei ha‘a ‘Amaleki; he na‘e mamae‘i ‘e he kakai ‘a e lelei ‘o e monumanu koe‘uhiā ke feilaulau ‘aki kia Sihova ko ho ‘Otua; ka ko hono toe kuo mau mōifua.
Pea pehē ‘e Sāmiuela kia Saula, Tatali, ka u fakahā kiate koe ‘a e me‘a na‘e folofola‘aki mai ‘e Sihova ‘anepō.
Pea ne tali, Lea pē. Pea pehē ‘e Sāmiuela, Lolotonga na‘a ke si‘i ‘i ho‘o vakai ‘a‘au, ‘ikai na‘a ke hoko ko e ‘ulu ‘o e ngaahi matakali ‘Isileli? Pea na‘e pani koe ‘e Sihova ke Tu‘i ‘Isileli,
pea fekau atu koe ‘e Sihova hao fononga, ‘o ne folofola mai, ‘Alu, ‘o mōifua ‘a e kau angahala na ko e kau ‘Amaleki, ‘o tau‘i kinautolu kae‘oua ke nau ‘osi.
Pea ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai te ke talangofua ai ki he folofola ‘a Sihova, ka kuo ke ‘oho ki he vete, ‘o ke fai ‘a e me‘a na‘e kovi kia Sihova?

Pea tali ‘a Saula kia Sāmiuela, ‘Ā, kuo u fai talangofua ki he folofola ‘a Sihova, pea kuo u fai ‘a e fononga kuo ne fekau ai au, pea kuo u ‘omi ‘a ‘Ēkaki, ‘a e Tu‘i ‘Āmoli, ka ko ‘Amaleki kuo u mōifua.
Ka na‘e to‘o ‘e he kakai mei he vete ha sipi mo ha pulu, ‘a e lelei ‘o e me‘a na‘e mōifua, ke fai feilaulau ‘aki kia Sihova ko ho ‘Otua ‘i Kilikali.

Pea pehē ‘e Sāmiuela, He ‘oku manako ‘e Sihova ki he ngaahi feilaulaumōifua mo e ngaahi feilaulau kehe ‘i he fai talangofua ki he‘ene folofola? Ko eni, ‘oku lelei ‘a e talangofua ‘i he fai feilaulau, pea ko e fakaongo ‘i he ngako‘i sipi tangata.
He ko e angahala fakafiemana ‘a e angatu‘u, pea ko e talangata‘a ko e fakahīteni tofu pē mo e tauhi ‘aitoli. Na‘a ke li‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova, pea kuo ne li‘aki koe mei ho‘o tu‘i.
Pea pehē ‘e Saula kia Sāmiuela, Kuo u hia; he kuo u hiki mei he fekau tonu ‘a Sihova, mo ho‘o ngaahi lea foki: he na‘a ku manavahē ki he kakai, ‘o u fakaongo ki honau le‘o.
Ka ko eni, fakamolemole mu‘a ‘eku angahala, pea foki mo au kau fai ‘eku lotu kia Sihova.
Pea pehē ‘e Sāmiuela kia Saula, ‘E ‘ikai te u foki mo koe; he kuo ke li‘aki ‘a e folofola ‘a Sihova, pea kuo li‘aki koe ‘e Sihova mei ho‘o Tu‘i ‘Isileli.
Pea ‘i he tafoki ‘a Sāmiuela ke ‘alu, na‘a ne puke ki he kapa ‘o hono kofu tōtōlofa, pea ne mahae.
Pea pehē ‘e Sāmiuela kiate ia, Kuo hae ‘e Sihova ‘a e pule‘anga ‘o ‘Isileli meiate koe he ‘aho ni, pea kuo ne foaki ki hao kaungā‘api, ha taha ‘oku lelei hake ‘iate koe.
Kae‘uma‘ā foki ko e Mālohinga ‘o ‘Isileli ‘e ‘ikai loi, pea ‘e ‘ikai fakatomala: he ‘oku ‘ikai ko e tangata ia ke ne fakatomala.
Pea ne pehē, Kuo u hia; ka ‘oku ou kole ke ke fakalāngilangi‘i au ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e mātu‘a ‘o hoku kakai, pea ‘i he ‘ao ‘o ‘Isileli, pea tafoki mo au ke fai ‘a e lotu kia Sihova ko ho ‘Otua.
Ko ia na‘e foki ‘a Sāmiuela ‘o muimui kia Saula; pea fai ‘e Saula ‘ene lotu kia Sihova.
Pea toki pehē ‘e Sāmiuela, ‘Omi kiate au ‘a ‘Ēkaki koe Tu‘i ‘Amaleki. Pea hā‘ele fiemālie mai ‘a ‘Ēkaki. He ne pehē ‘e ‘Ēkaki, Kuo pau kuo mahili ‘a e kona ‘o e mate.

Pea pehē ‘e Sāmiuela, Hangē kuo faka-ta‘e-ha-fānau ‘e ho‘o heletā ‘ani fafine, pehē ‘e nofo ta‘eha fānau ‘e ho‘o fa‘ē ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kau fefine. Pea na‘e have‘i ‘e Sāmiuela ‘a ‘Ēkaki ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘eiki ‘i Kilikali.
Pea ‘alu ‘a Sāmiuela ki Lama; pea ‘alu hake ‘a Saula ki hono fale ki Kipea-Saula.

Pea na‘e ‘ikai toe ‘a‘ahi ‘a Sāmiuela kia Saula, ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ‘o ‘ene pekia; ka ka fakamamahi ‘a Sāmiuela koe‘uhi ko Saula: pea fakatomala ‘e he ‘Eiki ‘i he‘ene fakanofo ‘a Saula ke Tu‘i ‘Isileli,
